ModMetaData.name: Mousekin Race
ModMetaData.author: sumghai
ModMetaData.description: Adds a race of hobbit-sized anthropomorphic white mice with a late-medieval to pre-industrial theme, inspired by Redwall, Mouse Guard, Brambly Hedge and Sylvanian Families. Features - Fisherian (1:1) sex ratio - Race-specific apparel, weapons, structures and crafting benches - Race-specific gameplay mechanics - Race-unique backstories and thoughts - Race-unique livestock and pet animals - Four NPC factions (with unique Ideologies): Kingdom, Independent Towns, Nomads and Brigands - Faction Allegiance system: pledge allegiance to either the Kingdom or Independent factions, and craft exclusive gear, recruit colonists, request traders and other perks - Vanilla-compatible art aesthetic - Rich, carefully curated lore
